languages.text: "Здесь почти как в палатах плазмадвигателя на флагмане. Смертоносные всполохи машинной искры, запах паленой плоти — и нити, которые должно оборвать".

traits.locale_text: "Здесь почти как в палатах плазмадвигателя на флагмане. Смертоносные всполохи машинной искры, запах паленой плоти — и нити, которые должно оборвать".

languages.text: "This place is almost like the plasma drive chambers on the flagship. The deadly flashes of the machine spark, the smell of scorched flesh — and threads that must be severed."
languages.original_text: "Здесь почти как в палатах плазмадвигателя на флагмане. Смертоносные всполохи машинной искры, запах паленой плоти — и нити, которые должно оборвать".

traits.locale_text: "This place is almost like the plasma drive chambers on the flagship. Machines emitting deadly sparks, the smell of scorched flesh — and threads that must be severed."
"This place is almost like the plasma drive chambers on the flagship. Machines emitting deadly sparks, the smell of scorched flesh — and threads that must be severed."
"This place is almost like the plasma drive chambers on the flagship. Machines emitting deadly sparks, the smell of scorched flesh — and threads that must be severed."
"This place is almost like the plasma drive chambers on the flagship. The deadly flashes of the machine spark, the smell of scorched flesh — and threads that must be severed."
"This place is almost like the plasma drive chambers on the flagship. The deadly flashes of the machine spark, the smell of scorched flesh — and threads that must be severed."
"This place is almost like the plasma drive chambers on the flagship. The deadly flashes of the machine spark, the smell of scorched flesh — and threads that must be severed."

languages.text: «Este lugar es muy similar a las cámaras del motor de plasma de la nave insignia. Los destellos letales de las chispas de la máquina, el olor a carne carbonizada... y los hilos que debemos cortar».
languages.original_text: "This place is almost like the plasma drive chambers on the flagship. The deadly flashes of the machine spark, the smell of scorched flesh — and threads that must be severed."

languages.text: 「この場所は、さながら旗艦のプラズマ ドライブ室のようだ。機械の致命的な火花、焦げた肉の匂い…そして断ち切るべき糸がある」
languages.original_text: "This place is almost like the plasma drive chambers on the flagship. The deadly flashes of the machine spark, the smell of scorched flesh — and threads that must be severed."

languages.text: “这个地方与旗舰上的等离子驱动室几乎没有任何区别。机器迸发着致命的火花，到处散发着肉烧焦的味道，还有许多必须隔断的丝线。”
languages.original_text: "This place is almost like the plasma drive chambers on the flagship. The deadly flashes of the machine spark, the smell of scorched flesh — and threads that must be severed."

languages.text: "Dieser Ort gleicht den Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern auf dem Flaggschiff. Die tödlichen Entladungen der Maschine, der Geruch von verbranntem Fleisch ... und Fäden, die durchtrennt werden müssen."
languages.original_text: "This place is almost like the plasma drive chambers on the flagship. The deadly flashes of the machine spark, the smell of scorched flesh — and threads that must be severed."

languages.text: « Cet endroit me fait penser aux salles du réacteur à plasma du vaisseau amiral. Les flashs aveuglants des étincelles de la machine, l'odeur de la chair calcinée… et les fils qui doivent être coupés. »
languages.original_text: "This place is almost like the plasma drive chambers on the flagship. The deadly flashes of the machine spark, the smell of scorched flesh — and threads that must be severed."
"This place is almost like the plasma drive chambers on the flagship. The deadly flashes of the machine spark, the smell of scorched flesh — and threads that must be severed."

languages.text: "Burası, neredeyse sancak gemisindeki plazma iticisi odalarının aynısı. Makine kıvılcımının ölümcül ışıltıları, kavrulmuş etin kokusu ve... Koparılması gereken iplikler..."
languages.original_text: "This place is almost like the plasma drive chambers on the flagship. The deadly flashes of the machine spark, the smell of scorched flesh — and threads that must be severed."
